title: 求助，MCPC端和客户端都进不去，不知是哪个Mod出问题
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.

Description: Exception in server tick loop
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: zv

 ... 34 more

replies.author: MJC
replies.txt_content: 内存不足，请分配更多内存

MJC 发表于 2013-6-26 22:00 
内存不足，请分配更多内存
谢谢。我删了些mod可以进了。
